content: on butterfly wings is a top-down shawl that might look complicated at first but rest assured that it is a two-row repeat that couldn t be simpler great for beginners--or for anyone who likes to keep a project going that is easy to remember making it free of stress with the approach of autumn we begin to say hello to cooler weather and good-bye to the flutter of butterflies as they begin their migration to warmer weather you can wrap yourself up in this cozy shawl and imagine that you are right there with them as they wing their way southward as the original shawl was made with acrylic i ve included a swatch in a blockable yarn so you can see a blocked version a video tutorial for this pattern is available here 1 courtesy of your friendly neighborhood fiberspider many thanks fiberspider **items made from my patterns are intended for personal use sale or world domination--as long as i get a parking space wherever i want once the world is yours ** 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=ia8pvazzcue&list=wl&index=63
